verses.verse: <S%G191><s%> And Heard <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Were <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea, <S%G2449><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> Received <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Went Up <S%G305><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> Contented <S%G1252><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Circumcision, <S%G4061><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> <S%G203><s%> Uncircumcised <S%G2192><s%> Thou Wentest In, <S%G1525><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Didst Eat With <S%G4906><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
<S%G756><s%> But Having Begun <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> He Set It Forth <S%G1620><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> In Order <S%G2517><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Was 2252 V-IXI-1S In 1722 PREP The City 4172 N-DSF Of Joppa 2445 N-DSF Praying, 4336 V-PNP-NSM And 2532 CONJ I Saw 1492 V-2AAI-1S In 1722 PREP A Trance 1611 N-DSF A Vision, 3705 N-ASN Descending 2597 V-PAP-ASN A Vessel 4632 N-NSN Certain 5100 X-NSN Like 5613 ADV A Sheet 3607 N-ASF Great 3173 A-ASF By Four 5064 A-DPF Corners 746 N-DPF Let Down 2524 V-PPP-ASF Out Of 1537 PREP The 3588 T-GSM Heaven, 3772 N-GSM And 2532 CONJ It Came 2064 V-2AAI-3S As Far As 891 PREP Me : 1700 P-1GS

On <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Having Looked Intently <S%G816><s%> I Considered, <S%G2657><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Quadrupeds <S%G5074><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wild Beasts <S%G2342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Creeping Things <S%G2062><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And I Heard <S%G1161><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> Having Risen Up, <S%G450><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Kill <S%G2380><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Eat. <S%G5315><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But I Said, <S%G1161><s%> In No Wise, <S%G3365><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Anything <S%G3956><s%> Common <S%G2839><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth. <S%G4750><s%> My <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answered <S%G1161><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> The <S%G1537><s%> Second Time <S%G1208><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Make Common. <S%G2840><s%>

<S%G5124><s%> And This <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1096><s%> Took Place <S%G1909><s%> Thrice, <S%G5151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Was Drawn Up <S%G385><s%> All <S%G537><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> To Go With <S%G4905><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Nothing <S%G3367><s%> Doubting. <S%G1252><s%> <S%G2064><s%> And Went <S%G1161><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Six <S%G1803><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> These, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Man, <S%G435><s%>

<S%G518><s%> And He Related <S%G5037><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying <S%G2036><s%> , To Him, <S%G846><s%> Send <S%G649><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Joppa <S%G2445><s%> , Men, <S%G435><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Send For <S%G3343><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Is Surnamed <S%G1941><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Speak <S%G2980><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> Where <S%G1722><s%> By <S%G3739><s%> Shalt Be Saved <S%G4982><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House. <S%G3624><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G1722><s%> In <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G756><s%> My Beginning <S%G3165><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> Fell <S%G1968><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Even As <S%G5618><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Beginning. <S%G746><s%>

<S%G3415><s%> And I Remembered <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Of The Lord, <S%G2962><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> He Said, <S%G3004><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Baptized <S%G907><s%> With Water <S%G5204><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Shall Be Baptized <S%G907><s%> With The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy. <S%G40><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Like <S%G2470><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> Having Believed <S%G4100><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1473><s%> And I, <S%G1161><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Was I, To Be <S%G2252><s%> Able <S%G1415><s%> To Forbid <S%G2967><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And Having Heard <S%G1161><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> They Were Silent, <S%G2270><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Then Indeed <S%G686><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Life. <S%G2222><s%>

They <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Who Were Scattered <S%G1289><s%> By <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Took Place <S%G1096><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Stephen, <S%G4736><s%> Passed Through <S%G1330><s%> To <S%G2193><s%> Phoenicia <S%G5403><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> To No One <S%G3367><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> To Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> But Were <S%G1161><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> Cypriots <S%G2953><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cyrenians, <S%G2956><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Come <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Antioch, <S%G490><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hellenists, <S%G1675><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings <S%G2097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was The <S%G2258><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G4183><s%> And A Great <S%G5037><s%> Number <S%G706><s%> Having Believed <S%G4100><s%> Turned <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Was Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Report <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Which Was <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Sent Forth <S%G1821><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> To Go Through <S%G1330><s%> As Far As <S%G2193><s%> Antioch : <S%G490><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> Having Come <S%G3854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Rejoiced, <S%G5463><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exhorted <S%G3870><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With <S%G3588><s%> Purpose <S%G4286><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Heart <S%G2588><s%> To Abide With <S%G4357><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Faith. <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Added <S%G4369><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Large <S%G2425><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
<S%G1831><s%> And Went Forth <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Tarsus <S%G5019><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> To Seek <S%G327><s%> Saul; <S%G4569><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Found <S%G2147><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Brought <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Antioch. <S%G490><s%> <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> They <S%G846><s%> A Year <S%G1763><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> Were Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly, <S%G1577><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Taught <S%G1321><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Large : <S%G2425><s%> <S%G5537><s%> And Were Called <S%G5037><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Christians. <S%G5546><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3778><s%> And In These <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Came Down <S%G2718><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> Prophets <S%G4396><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Antioch; <S%G490><s%>

<S%G450><s%> And Having Risen Up <S%G1161><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> By Name <S%G3686><s%> Agabus, <S%G13><s%> He Signified <S%G4591><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> A Famine <S%G3042><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Be <S%G2071><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World; <S%G3625><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> Under <S%G1909><s%> Claudius <S%G2804><s%> Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

And <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Was Prospered <S%G2141><s%> Any One, <S%G5100><s%> Determined, <S%G3724><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> Of Them, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Ministration <S%G1248><s%> To Send <S%G3992><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Dwelling <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> Brethren; <S%G80><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They Did, <S%G4160><s%> Sending It <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> By The <S%G1223><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Of Barnabas <S%G921><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saul. <S%G4569><s%>
